actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to require the locomotive of all trains to be equipped with strobe lights.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring that the locomotives of all trains be equipped with strobe lights for safety purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to require the locomotive of all trains to be equipped with strobe lights.
